description: Try our easy to follow Potato Salad with BBQ Lamb Chops recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ lamb,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Potato salad,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Asparagus,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Potato Salad with BBQ Lamb Chops Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g snow pea sprouts, coarsely chopped into 3cm
1 cup mint leaves, torn if large

recipeInstructions.text: Place potatoes in a large saucepan and add enough cold water to cover. Bring to the boil over medium heat, simmer rapidly for 1215 minutes or until just tender. Be careful not to overcook. Gently drain. Allow to steam and cool slightly. Then halve lengthways.
Meanwhile, combine oil, lemon rind, juice and honey in a small bowl, whisk with a fork. Season to taste.

Place asparagus on a large plate and pour over 1 tablespoon of the dressing, turn to coat. Cook on a preheated chargrill or flat plate of preheated barbecue. Cook turning until charred and bright green. Transfer to the chopping board.

Meanwhile, add lamb to same large plate and turn to coat in 1 tablespoon of dressing. Season. Cook lamb on barbecue, turning for 6 minutes or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate to rest for 3 minutes.
Cut asparagus into 4cm lengths and place in a large bowl with potatoes, remaining dressing, spring onion, mint and sprouts and toss to combine.

Serve potato salad with lamb. Tip 1: You can add some barbecued rindless bacon rashers, chopped for extra flavour. Tip 2: If you like a creamy dressing on your potatoes substitute lemon and oil for 1/2 sour cream and 1/2 whole egg mayonnaise whisked with a little water. Tip 3: This potato salad is best served warm
